subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tyler Evans’s long 3-pointer at the overtime buzzer lifted undefeated Findlay to a 56-53 victory against Cal Poly Pomona in the men’s Division II national championship game in Springfield, Mass. Evans, a senior reserve guard, hit a 26-footer from the right wing for his only basket of the game as Findlay (Ohio) completed a 36-0 season. Cal Poly Pomona (25-8) was trying to become the first unranked team to win the tournament since North Alabama in 1979.
